article: The moon had gone behind a cloud and there weren't many stars in the sky. I saw a flame in my neighbour's  kitchen  . I thought he was having a midnight fast food so I went back to my  _  . Soon, there was a  _  smell in the air and I guessed something was wrong.  At once  , I jumped out of bed and went downstairs to  _  . I saw fire coming out of my neighbour's kitchen. Right away, I  _  "Fire! Fire!" But there was no one nearby to  hear  my shouts for help. I  _  into my house, called the Fire Department and went back to my neighbour's house. I rang the doorbell, hit on the door and  called out  my neighbour's name but there was no  _  . I managed to  break into  the house and rescued a cat and a rabbit. I tried to throw water through the kitchen window  _  it was no use; the fire was too strong.  _  , a fire engine arrived and soon the firemen put out the fire. They arrived just  in time  as the fire was going to  _  to the other rooms in the house. When my neighbour came back, he was  _  because his kitchen was burnt down, but he thanked me for calling the Fire Department and for saving his  _  . He wanted to give me some money in return but I did not  _  it. Weeks later, my neighbour repaired and restored his kitchen. He  _  me to his new kitchen and there he gave me a medal that he had  _  ordered from a factory. It made me very happy.
